00072 typedef struct s_dt5720_odb{
00073   BYTE      software_trigger_mode;
00074   BYTE      hardware_trigger_mode;
00075   BYTE      self_trigger_mode;
00076   BOOL      trigger_positive_edge;
00077   DWORD     max_events_per_block;
00078   BOOL      event_aligned_readout;

00087     BOOL      enable;

00106 } S_DT5720_ODB_DEF;

00108 static S_DT5720_ODB_DEF S_DT5720_ODB;

00110 #define S_DT5720_ODB_STR "\
00111 [.]\n\
00112 software_trigger_mode = BYTE : 0\n\
00113 hardware_trigger_mode = BYTE : 0\n\
00114 self_trigger_mode = BYTE : 0\n\
00115 trigger_positive_edge = BOOL : y\n\
00116 max_events_per_block = DWORD : 1024\n\
00117 event_aligned_readout = BOOL : y\n\
00118 logic_level = STRING : [4] NIM\n\
00119 post_trigger_size = BYTE : 20\n\
00120 gpi_acquisition_mode = BOOL : n\n\
00121 zero_suppression_mode = BYTE : 0\n\
00122 event_packing = BOOL : n\n\
00123 ext_clock = BOOL : n\n\
00124 waveform length = DWORD : 64\n\
00125 \n\
00126 [Ch00]\n\
00127 enable = BOOL : n\n\
00128 offset = FLOAT : 0\n\
00129 self_trigger_threshhold = FLOAT : 0\n\
00130 \n\
00131 [Ch01]\n\
00132 enable = BOOL : n\n\
00133 offset = FLOAT : 0\n\
00134 self_trigger_threshhold = FLOAT : 0\n\
00135 \n\
00136 [Ch02]\n\
00137 enable = BOOL : n\n\
00138 offset = FLOAT : 0\n\
00139 self_trigger_threshhold = FLOAT : 0\n\
00140 \n\
00141 [Ch03]\n\
00142 enable = BOOL : n\n\
00143 offset = FLOAT : 0\n\
00144 self_trigger_threshhold = FLOAT : 0\
00145 "

00150 INT dt5720_init()
00151 {
00152   printf("Opening CAEN USB interface ...");
00153   fflush(stdout);
00154 
00155   HNDLE hKey;
00156   CAEN_DGTZ_ErrorCode ret;
00157   CAEN_DGTZ_BoardInfo_t BoardInfo;
00158 
00159   /* Grab Board */
00160   /* int iLine = 0;
00161        ret = CAEN_DGTZ_OpenDigitizer(CAEN_DGTZ_USB,iLine,0,VME_BASE,&handle);*/
00162   ret = CAEN_DGTZ_OpenDigitizer(CAEN_DGTZ_USB,0,0,VME_BASE,&handle);
00163   /*
00164   while(ret==CAEN_DGTZ_CommError)
00165     {
00166       //iLine++;
00167       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_OpenDigitizer(CAEN_DGTZ_USB,iLine,0,VME_BASE,&handle);
00168     }
00169   */
00170   if(is_caen_error(ret,__LINE__-1,"dt5720_init")) return FE_ERR_HW;
00171 
00172   /* Get Board Info */
00173   ret = CAEN_DGTZ_GetInfo(handle,&BoardInfo);
00174   if(is_caen_error(ret,__LINE__-1,"dt5720_init")) return FE_ERR_HW;
00175   printf("\nConnected to CAEN Desktop Digitizer Model %s\n",BoardInfo.ModelName);
00176   printf("\tROC FPGA Release is %s\n",BoardInfo.ROC_FirmwareRel);
00177   printf("\tAMC FPGA Release is %s\n",BoardInfo.AMC_FirmwareRel);
00178   
00179   /* Reset Digitizer */
00180   ret = CAEN_DGTZ_Reset(handle);
00181   if(is_caen_error(ret,__LINE__-1,"dt5720_init")) return FE_ERR_HW;
00182 
00183   /* Link to Database */
00184   //cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB,NULL);
00185   char str[1024];
00186   sprintf(str,"/Equipment/Crate %i/Settings/CAEN",crate_number);
00187   int status = db_check_record(hDB,0,str,S_DT5720_ODB_STR,FALSE);
00188   if(status==DB_NO_KEY || status==DB_STRUCT_MISMATCH)
00189     {
00190       status = db_create_record(hDB,0,str,S_DT5720_ODB_STR);
00191       printf("Creating key with status: %d \n",status);
00192     }
00193   else if (status==DB_INVALID_HANDLE)
00194     {
00195       printf("Error: Cannot connect to database to setup CAEN DT5720.");
00196     }
00197 
00198   status = db_find_key(hDB,0,str,&hKey);
00199   status = db_open_record(hDB,hKey,&S_DT5720_ODB,sizeof(S_DT5720_ODB),MODE_READ,NULL,NULL);
00200 
00201   // configure clock input
00202   if ( S_DT5720_ODB.ext_clock ) 
00203     {
00204       printf("Using external clock\n");
00205       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_WriteRegister(handle, CAEN_DGTZ_ACQ_CONTROL_ADD, 1<<6); 
00206       if(is_caen_error(ret,__LINE__-1,"dt5720_init")) return FE_ERR_HW;
00207     }
00208   else
00209     {
00210       printf("Using internal clock\n");
00211     }
00212 
00213 
00214   return status;
00215 
00216 }
00217 
00218 void dt5720_exit()
00219 {
00220 
00221   CAEN_DGTZ_ErrorCode ret;
00222   ret = CAEN_DGTZ_CloseDigitizer(handle);
00223   is_caen_error(ret,__LINE__-1,"dt5720_exit");
00224   free(data_buffer);
00225 }
00226 
00227 INT dt5720_pre_bor()
00228 {
00229   CAEN_DGTZ_ErrorCode ret;
00230 
00231 #ifdef SW_CONTROL
00232   ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetAcquisitionMode(handle,CAEN_DGTZ_SW_CONTROLLED);
00233   if(is_caen_error(ret,__LINE__-1,"dt5720_bor")) return FE_ERR_HW;
00234   ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SWStartAcquisition(handle);
00235   if(is_caen_error(ret,__LINE__-1,"dt5720_bor")) return FE_ERR_HW;
00236 #endif /* SW_CONTROL */
00237 
00238   /* Setup Digitizer */
00239   if(!dt5720_update_digitizer()) return FE_ERR_HW;
00240 
00241   /* Allocate space for readout from digitizer */
00242   ret = CAEN_DGTZ_MallocReadoutBuffer(handle,&caen_data_buffer,&caen_data_buffer_size);
00243   if(is_caen_error(ret,__LINE__-1,"dt5720_bor")) return FE_ERR_HW;
00244   printf("Allocated %i bytes for CAEN data buffer\n", caen_data_buffer_size);
00245 
00246   /* Clear any remaining data */
00247   ret = CAEN_DGTZ_ClearData(handle);
00248   if(is_caen_error(ret,__LINE__-1,"dt5720_bor")) return FE_ERR_HW;
00249 
00250   data_size = 0;
00251 
00252   return SUCCESS;
00253 }
00254 
00255 INT dt5720_eor()
00256 {
00257 
00258   CAEN_DGTZ_ErrorCode ret;
00259 #ifdef SW_CONTROL
00260   ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SWStopAcquisition(handle);
00261   if(is_caen_error(ret,__LINE__-1,"dt5720_bor")) return FE_ERR_HW;
00262 #endif /* SW_CONTROL */
00263   ret = CAEN_DGTZ_FreeReadoutBuffer(&caen_data_buffer);
00264   if(is_caen_error(ret,__LINE__-1,"dt5720_eor")) return FE_ERR_HW;
00265 
00266   caen_data_buffer = NULL;
00267 
00268   return SUCCESS;
00269 }
00270 
00271 INT dt5720_read(char *pevent)
00272 {
00273   //printf("Read out data from desktop digitizer\n");
00274 
00275   // =====================================================================================
00276   // Read out remaining data from the digitizer
00277   // =====================================================================================
00278   dt5720_readout();
00279 
00280   // =====================================================================================
00281   // Fill MIDAS event
00282   // =====================================================================================
00283   bk_init32(pevent);
00284   char bk_name[5];
00285   char *pdata;
00286 
00287   sprintf(bk_name,"CND0");
00288   bk_create(pevent, bk_name, TID_BYTE, &pdata);
00289   if ( data_size > MAX_EVENT_SIZE )
00290     {
00291       cm_msg(MERROR,"dt5720_read","Event size is too large. Truncating data...\n");
00292       data_size = MAX_EVENT_SIZE;
00293     }
00294   memcpy(pdata, data_buffer, data_size);
00295   pdata += data_size;
00296   bk_close(pevent, pdata);
00297   // reset data couner for the next event
00298   data_size = 0;
00299 
00300   return SUCCESS;
00301 }
00302 
00303 void dt5720_readout()
00304 {
00305 
00306   CAEN_DGTZ_ErrorCode ret;  
00307   uint32_t caen_data_size;
00308 
00309   /* Read out data if there is any */
00310   ret = CAEN_DGTZ_ReadData(handle,CAEN_DGTZ_SLAVE_TERMINATED_READOUT_MBLT,caen_data_buffer, &caen_data_size);
00311   is_caen_error(ret,__LINE__-1,"dt5720_readout");
00312 
00313   /* If there's data, copy from digitizers local buffer to different local buffer */
00314   if(caen_data_size > 0)
00315     {
00316       //printf("data size: %i\n", caen_data_size);
00317 
00318       if(data_size+caen_data_size < data_buffer_size )
00319         {
00320           memcpy((data_buffer+data_size), caen_data_buffer, caen_data_size);
00321           data_size += caen_data_size;
00322         }
00323     }
00324 }
00325 
00326 INT dt5720_poll_live()
00327 {
00328 
00329   dt5720_readout();
00330 
00331   return SUCCESS;
00332 }
00333 
00334 BOOL dt5720_update_digitizer()
00335 {
00336   CAEN_DGTZ_ErrorCode ret;
00337   /* General CAEN settings */
00338 
00339   switch(S_DT5720_ODB.software_trigger_mode)
00340     {
00341     case 0:
00342       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetSWTriggerMode(handle,CAEN_DGTZ_TRGMODE_DISABLED);
00343       break;
00344     case 1:
00345       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetSWTriggerMode(handle,CAEN_DGTZ_TRGMODE_ACQ_ONLY);
00346       break;
00347     case 2:
00348       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetSWTriggerMode(handle,CAEN_DGTZ_TRGMODE_EXTOUT_ONLY);
00349       break;
00350     case 3:
00351       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetSWTriggerMode(handle,CAEN_DGTZ_TRGMODE_ACQ_AND_EXTOUT);
00352       break;
00353     default:
00354       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetSWTriggerMode(handle,CAEN_DGTZ_TRGMODE_DISABLED);
00355       cm_msg(MINFO,"dt5720_update_digitizer","Invalid software trigger mode. Set to DISABLED. (%i)",(int)S_DT5720_ODB.software_trigger_mode);
00356       break;
00357     }
00358   if(is_caen_error(ret,__LINE__,"dt5720_update_digitizer")) return false;
00359 
00360   switch(S_DT5720_ODB.hardware_trigger_mode)
00361     {
00362     case 0:
00363       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetExtTriggerInputMode(handle,CAEN_DGTZ_TRGMODE_DISABLED);
00364       break;
00365     case 1:
00366       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetExtTriggerInputMode(handle,CAEN_DGTZ_TRGMODE_ACQ_ONLY);
00367       break;
00368     case 2:
00369       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetExtTriggerInputMode(handle,CAEN_DGTZ_TRGMODE_EXTOUT_ONLY);
00370       break;
00371     case 3:
00372       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetExtTriggerInputMode(handle,CAEN_DGTZ_TRGMODE_ACQ_AND_EXTOUT);
00373       break;
00374     default:
00375       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetExtTriggerInputMode(handle,CAEN_DGTZ_TRGMODE_DISABLED);
00376       cm_msg(MINFO,"dt5720_update_digitizer","Invalid hardware trigger mode. Set to DISABLED.");
00377       break;
00378     }
00379   if(is_caen_error(ret,__LINE__,"dt5720_update_digitizer")) return false;
00380 
00381   uint32_t caen_self_trigger_mask = 0b1111;
00382   switch(S_DT5720_ODB.self_trigger_mode)
00383     {
00384     case 0:
00385       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetChannelSelfTrigger(handle,CAEN_DGTZ_TRGMODE_DISABLED,caen_self_trigger_mask);
00386       break;
00387     case 1:
00388       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetChannelSelfTrigger(handle,CAEN_DGTZ_TRGMODE_ACQ_ONLY,caen_self_trigger_mask);
00389       break;
00390     case 2:
00391       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetChannelSelfTrigger(handle,CAEN_DGTZ_TRGMODE_EXTOUT_ONLY,caen_self_trigger_mask);
00392       break;
00393     case 3:
00394       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetChannelSelfTrigger(handle,CAEN_DGTZ_TRGMODE_ACQ_AND_EXTOUT,caen_self_trigger_mask);
00395       break;
00396     default:
00397       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetChannelSelfTrigger(handle,CAEN_DGTZ_TRGMODE_DISABLED,caen_self_trigger_mask);
00398       cm_msg(MINFO,"dt5720_update_digitizer","Invalid channel self trigger mode. Set to DISABLED. (%i)",(int)S_DT5720_ODB.self_trigger_mode);
00399       break;
00400     }
00401   if(is_caen_error(ret,__LINE__,"dt5720_update_digitizer")) return false;
00402 
00403   // According to correspondence with CAEN, second argument (channel nuumber) is ignored.
00404   // But just in case...
00405   if(S_DT5720_ODB.trigger_positive_edge)
00406     {
00407       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetTriggerPolarity(handle,0,CAEN_DGTZ_TriggerOnRisingEdge);
00408       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetTriggerPolarity(handle,1,CAEN_DGTZ_TriggerOnRisingEdge);
00409       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetTriggerPolarity(handle,2,CAEN_DGTZ_TriggerOnRisingEdge);
00410       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetTriggerPolarity(handle,3,CAEN_DGTZ_TriggerOnRisingEdge);
00411     }
00412   else
00413     {
00414       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetTriggerPolarity(handle,0,CAEN_DGTZ_TriggerOnFallingEdge);
00415       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetTriggerPolarity(handle,1,CAEN_DGTZ_TriggerOnFallingEdge);
00416       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetTriggerPolarity(handle,2,CAEN_DGTZ_TriggerOnFallingEdge);
00417       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetTriggerPolarity(handle,3,CAEN_DGTZ_TriggerOnFallingEdge);
00418     }
00419   if(is_caen_error(ret,__LINE__,"dt5720_update_digitizer")) return false;
00420 
00421   if(S_DT5720_ODB.max_events_per_block >= 2 && S_DT5720_ODB.max_events_per_block <= 1024)
00422     {
00423       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetMaxNumEventsBLT(handle,S_DT5720_ODB.max_events_per_block);
00424     }
00425   else
00426     {
00427       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetMaxNumEventsBLT(handle,1024);
00428       cm_msg(MINFO,"dt5720_update_digitizer","Invalid max block size. Set to 1024.");
00429     }
00430   if(is_caen_error(ret,__LINE__,"dt5720_update_digitizer")) return false;
00431 
00432   if(strcmp(S_DT5720_ODB.logic_level,"NIM") == 0)
00433     ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetIOLevel(handle,CAEN_DGTZ_IOLevel_NIM);
00434   else if(strcmp(S_DT5720_ODB.logic_level,"TTL") == 0)
00435     ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetIOLevel(handle,CAEN_DGTZ_IOLevel_TTL);
00436   else
00437     {
00438       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetIOLevel(handle,CAEN_DGTZ_IOLevel_NIM);
00439       cm_msg(MINFO,"dt5720_update_digitizer","Invalid logic level. Set to NIM.");
00440     }
00441   if(is_caen_error(ret,__LINE__,"dt5720_update_digitizer")) return false;
00442 
00443   if(S_DT5720_ODB.post_trigger_size >= 0 && S_DT5720_ODB.post_trigger_size <=100)
00444     {
00445       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetPostTriggerSize(handle,S_DT5720_ODB.post_trigger_size);
00446     }
00447   else
00448     {
00449       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetPostTriggerSize(handle,80);
00450       cm_msg(MINFO,"dt5720_update_digitizer","Invalid post trigger size. Set to 80 percent.");
00451     }
00452   if(is_caen_error(ret,__LINE__,"dt5720_update_digitizer")) return false;
00453 
00454   if(S_DT5720_ODB.gpi_acquisition_mode)
00455     {
00456       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetAcquisitionMode(handle,CAEN_DGTZ_S_IN_CONTROLLED);
00457     }
00458   else
00459     {
00460       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetAcquisitionMode(handle,CAEN_DGTZ_SW_CONTROLLED);
00461     }
00462   if(is_caen_error(ret,__LINE__,"dt5720_update_digitizer")) return false;
00463 
00464   switch(S_DT5720_ODB.zero_suppression_mode)
00465     {
00466     case 0:
00467       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetZeroSuppressionMode(handle,CAEN_DGTZ_ZS_NO);
00468       break;
00469     case 2:
00470       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetZeroSuppressionMode(handle,CAEN_DGTZ_ZS_ZLE);
00471       break;
00472     case 3:
00473       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetZeroSuppressionMode(handle,CAEN_DGTZ_ZS_AMP);
00474       break;
00475     default:
00476       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetZeroSuppressionMode(handle,CAEN_DGTZ_ZS_NO);
00477       cm_msg(MINFO,"dt5720_update_digitizer","Invalid zero suppression mode. Set to none.");
00478       break;
00479     }
00480   if(is_caen_error(ret,__LINE__,"dt5720_update_digitizer")) return false;
00481 
00482 
00483   if(S_DT5720_ODB.event_packing)
00484     {
00485       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetEventPackaging(handle,CAEN_DGTZ_ENABLE);
00486     }
00487   else
00488     {
00489       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetEventPackaging(handle,CAEN_DGTZ_DISABLE);
00490     }
00491   if(is_caen_error(ret,__LINE__,"dt5720_update_digitizer")) return false;
00492 
00493   // Channel specific
00494   uint32_t caen_channel_mask = 0;
00495   if(S_DT5720_ODB.ch00.enable)
00496     caen_channel_mask |= (1 << 0);
00497   if(S_DT5720_ODB.ch01.enable)
00498     caen_channel_mask |= (1 << 1);
00499   if(S_DT5720_ODB.ch02.enable)
00500     caen_channel_mask |= (1 << 2);
00501   if(S_DT5720_ODB.ch03.enable)
00502     caen_channel_mask |= (1 << 3);
00503   ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetChannelEnableMask(handle,caen_channel_mask);
00504 
00505   ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetChannelDCOffset(handle,
00506                                               0,
00507                                               analog2adc_offset(0));
00508   if(is_caen_error(ret,__LINE__,"dt5720_update_digitizer")) return false;
00509   ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetChannelDCOffset(handle,
00510                                               1,
00511                                               analog2adc_offset(1));
00512   if(is_caen_error(ret,__LINE__,"dt5720_update_digitizer")) return false;
00513   ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetChannelDCOffset(handle,
00514                                               2,
00515                                               analog2adc_offset(2));
00516   if(is_caen_error(ret,__LINE__,"dt5720_update_digitizer")) return false;
00517   ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetChannelDCOffset(handle,
00518                                               3,
00519                                               analog2adc_offset(3));
00520   if(is_caen_error(ret,__LINE__,"dt5720_update_digitizer")) return false;
00521 
00522   ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetChannelTriggerThreshold(handle,
00523                                                       0,
00524                                                       analog2adc_trigger(0));
00525   if(is_caen_error(ret,__LINE__,"dt5720_update_digitizer")) return false;
00526   ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetChannelTriggerThreshold(handle,
00527                                                       1,
00528                                                       analog2adc_trigger(1));
00529   if(is_caen_error(ret,__LINE__,"dt5720_update_digitizer")) return false;
00530   ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetChannelTriggerThreshold(handle,
00531                                                       2,
00532                                                       analog2adc_trigger(2));
00533   if(is_caen_error(ret,__LINE__,"dt5720_update_digitizer")) return false;
00534   ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetChannelTriggerThreshold(handle,
00535                                                       3,
00536                                                       analog2adc_trigger(3));
00537   if(is_caen_error(ret,__LINE__,"dt5720_update_digitizer")) return false;
00538 
00539   // =====================================================================================
00540   // Record length
00541   // =====================================================================================
00542   ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetRecordLength(handle, S_DT5720_ODB.wf_length);
00543   if ( ret != CAEN_DGTZ_Success )
00544     {
00545       cm_msg(MERROR,"dt5720_update_digitizer","Cannot SetRecordLength. Error 0x%08x\n",ret);
00546       return FE_ERR_HW;
00547     }
00548   
00549   // ======================================================================================
00550   // Channel configuration through register 0x8000=CAEN_DGTZ_BROAD_CH_CTRL_ADD
00551   // ======================================================================================
00552   uint32_t data;
00553   ret = CAEN_DGTZ_ReadRegister(handle, CAEN_DGTZ_BROAD_CH_CTRL_ADD, &data);
00554   if(is_caen_error(ret,__LINE__-1,"dt5720_update_digitizer")) return FE_ERR_HW;
00555 
00556   // Bit 4 must always be set to 1
00557   data |= (1<<4);
00558   // enable trigger overlap
00559   data |= (1<<1);
00560   ret = CAEN_DGTZ_WriteRegister(handle, CAEN_DGTZ_BROAD_CH_CTRL_ADD, data);
00561   if(is_caen_error(ret,__LINE__-1,"dt5720_update_digitizer")) return FE_ERR_HW;
00562 
00563   data_buffer_size = 32*1024*1024;
00564   data_buffer = (char*) malloc(data_buffer_size);
00565 
00566   return true;
00567 }
00568 
00569 uint32_t analog2adc_offset(int ch)
00570 {
00571 
00572   static const uint32_t adcmax = 65535;
00573   static const uint32_t adcmin = 0;
00574   static const float analogmax = 1.;
00575   static const float analogmin = -1.;
00576   static const float slope = (float)(adcmax-adcmin)/(analogmax-analogmin);
00577 
00578   /*
00579     Map analogue voltage offset (-1V-1V) to 16 bit ADC value (0-65535=2^16-1)
00580     Dynamic ranges:
00581     0x0000 -> -2V to 0V
00582     0x8000 -> -1V to 1V
00583     0xFFFF ->  0V to 2V
00584   */
00585   float v;
00586   switch(ch)
00587     {
00588     case 0: v = S_DT5720_ODB.ch00.offset; break;
00589     case 1: v = S_DT5720_ODB.ch01.offset; break;
00590     case 2: v = S_DT5720_ODB.ch02.offset; break;
00591     case 3: v = S_DT5720_ODB.ch03.offset; break;
00592     default: return 0x8000;
00593     }
00594 
00595   if(v>analogmax)
00596     {
00597       cm_msg(MINFO,"dt5720_update_digitizer","Invalid voltage offset. Set to 1V.");
00598       return adcmin;
00599     }
00600   else if(v<analogmin)
00601     {
00602       cm_msg(MINFO,"dt5720_update_digitizer","Invalid voltage offset. Set to -1V.");
00603       return adcmax;
00604     }
00605 
00606   v += 1.;
00607 
00608   uint32_t dac = slope*v;
00609   printf("DAC offset: channel %i DAC %i\n",ch, dac);
00610 
00611 
00612   return dac;
00613 }
00614 
00615 uint32_t analog2adc_trigger(int ch)
00616 {
00617   static const float dynamicrange = 2.;
00618   static const uint32_t adcmax = 4095;
00619   //static const uint32_t adcmax = 65535;
00620   static const uint32_t adcmin = 0;
00621   static const float slope = (adcmax-adcmin)/dynamicrange;
00622 
00623   float v, vmin;
00624 
00625   switch(ch)
00626     {
00627     case 0:
00628       v = S_DT5720_ODB.ch00.self_trigger_threshold;
00629       vmin = S_DT5720_ODB.ch00.offset - 1.;
00630       break;
00631     case 1:
00632       v = S_DT5720_ODB.ch01.self_trigger_threshold;
00633       vmin = S_DT5720_ODB.ch01.offset - 1.;
00634       break;
00635     case 2:
00636       v = S_DT5720_ODB.ch02.self_trigger_threshold;
00637       vmin = S_DT5720_ODB.ch02.offset - 1.;
00638       break;
00639     case 3:
00640       v = S_DT5720_ODB.ch03.self_trigger_threshold;
00641       vmin = S_DT5720_ODB.ch03.offset - 1.;
00642       break;
00643     default:
00644       return (adcmax-adcmin)/2;
00645     }
00646 
00647   if(v<vmin || v>(vmin+dynamicrange))
00648     {
00649       v = vmin+dynamicrange/2.;
00650       cm_msg(MINFO,"dt5720_update_digitizer","Invalid self trigger threshold. Set to center.");
00651     }
00652 
00653   uint32_t dac = (v-vmin)*slope;
00654   printf("Trigger threshold: channel %i DAC %i DAC\n",ch,dac);
00655   
00656   return dac;
00657 }
00658 
00659 BOOL is_caen_error(CAEN_DGTZ_ErrorCode e, int l, const char* r)
00660 {
00661   /*
00662     l: line number
00663     f: file name
00664     r: parent routine
00665   */
00666 
00667   static char* f = __FILE__;
00668 
00669   if(e==CAEN_DGTZ_Success)
00670     return FALSE;
00671 
00672   switch(e)
00673     {
00674     case CAEN_DGTZ_CommError:
00675       cm_msg(MT_ERROR,f,l,r,"CAEN DT5720 Communication error.");      
00676       break;
00677     case CAEN_DGTZ_GenericError:
00678       cm_msg(MT_ERROR,f,l,r,"CAEN DT5720 Generic (unspecified) error.");
00679       break;
00680     case CAEN_DGTZ_InvalidParam:
00681       cm_msg(MT_ERROR,f,l,r,"CAEN DT5720 Invalid parameter error.");
00682       break;
00683     case CAEN_DGTZ_InvalidLinkType:
00684       cm_msg(MT_ERROR,f,l,r,"CAEN DT5720 Invalid LinkType.");
00685       break;
00686     case CAEN_DGTZ_InvalidHandle:
00687       cm_msg(MT_ERROR,f,l,r,"CAEN DT5720 Invalid handle.");
00688       break;
00689     case CAEN_DGTZ_MaxDevicesError:
00690       cm_msg(MT_ERROR,f,l,r,"CAEN DT5720 Too many devices.");
00691       break;
00692     case CAEN_DGTZ_BadBoardType:
00693       cm_msg(MT_ERROR,f,l,r,"CAEN DT5720 Operation not allowed on this model.");
00694       break;
00695     case CAEN_DGTZ_BadInterruptLev:
00696       cm_msg(MT_ERROR,f,l,r,"CAEN DT5720 Invalid interrupt level.");
00697       break;
00698     case CAEN_DGTZ_BadEventNumber:
00699       cm_msg(MT_ERROR,f,l,r,"CAEN DT5720 Invalid event number.");
00700       break;
00701     case CAEN_DGTZ_ReadDeviceRegisterFail:
00702       cm_msg(MT_ERROR,f,l,r,"CAEN DT5720 Unable to read from registry.");
00703       break;
00704     case CAEN_DGTZ_WriteDeviceRegisterFail:
00705       cm_msg(MT_ERROR,f,l,r,"CAEN DT5720 Unable to write to registry.");
00706       break;
00707     case CAEN_DGTZ_InvalidChannelNumber:
00708       cm_msg(MT_ERROR,f,l,r,"CAEN DT5720 Invalid channel number.");
00709       break;
00710     case CAEN_DGTZ_ChannelBusy:
00711       cm_msg(MT_ERROR,f,l,r,"CAEN DT5720 Channel is busy.");
00712       break;
00713     case CAEN_DGTZ_FPIOModeInvalid:
00714       cm_msg(MT_ERROR,f,l,r,"CAEN DT5720 Invalid FPIO (?) mode.");
00715       break;
00716     case CAEN_DGTZ_WrongAcqMode:
00717       cm_msg(MT_ERROR,f,l,r,"CAEN DT5720 Invalid acquisition mode.");
00718       break;
00719     case CAEN_DGTZ_FunctionNotAllowed:
00720       cm_msg(MT_ERROR,f,l,r,"CAEN DT5720 Module does not support this function.");
00721       break;
00722     case CAEN_DGTZ_Timeout:
00723       cm_msg(MT_ERROR,f,l,r,"CAEN DT5720 Communication timed out.");
00724       break;
00725     case CAEN_DGTZ_InvalidBuffer:
00726       cm_msg(MT_ERROR,f,l,r,"CAEN DT5720 Invalid buffer (readout or event).");
00727       break;
00728     case CAEN_DGTZ_EventNotFound:
00729       cm_msg(MT_ERROR,f,l,r,"CAEN DT5720 Unable to find event.");
00730       break;
00731     case CAEN_DGTZ_InvalidEvent:
00732       cm_msg(MT_ERROR,f,l,r,"CAEN DT5720 Event is invalid.");
00733       break;
00734     case CAEN_DGTZ_OutOfMemory:
00735       cm_msg(MT_ERROR,f,l,r,"CAEN DT5720 Memory has run out.");
00736       break;
00737     case CAEN_DGTZ_CalibrationError:
00738       cm_msg(MT_ERROR,f,l,r,"CAEN DT5720 Calibration failed.");
00739       break;
00740     case CAEN_DGTZ_DigitizerNotFound:
00741       cm_msg(MT_ERROR,f,l,r,"CAEN DT5720 Unable to locate digitizer.");
00742       break;
00743     case CAEN_DGTZ_DigitizerAlreadyOpen:
00744       cm_msg(MT_ERROR,f,l,r,"CAEN DT5720 Digitizer is already open.");
00745       break;
00746     case CAEN_DGTZ_DigitizerNotReady:
00747       cm_msg(MT_ERROR,f,l,r,"CAEN DT5720 Digitizer not ready.");
00748       break;
00749     case CAEN_DGTZ_InterruptNotConfigured:
00750       cm_msg(MT_ERROR,f,l,r,"CAEN DT5720 Interrupts not configured.");
00751       break;
00752     case CAEN_DGTZ_DigitizerMemoryCorrupted:
00753       cm_msg(MT_ERROR,f,l,r,"CAEN DT5720 Flash memory corrupted.");
00754       break;
00755     case CAEN_DGTZ_DPPFirmwareNotSupported:
00756       cm_msg(MT_ERROR,f,l,r,"CAEN DT5720 Firmware not supported by these libraries.");
00757       break;
00758     case CAEN_DGTZ_NotYetImplemented:
00759       cm_msg(MT_ERROR,f,l,r,"CAEN DT5720 Function not yet implemented.");
00760       break;
00761     default:
00762       cm_msg(MT_ERROR,f,l,r,"CAEN DT5720 Unknown error.");
00763       break;
00764     }
00765   return TRUE;
00766 }
